text: Burnage is a suburb of the City of Manchester in North West England. It lies about four miles (6.4 km) south of Manchester city centre. According to the 2001 census it had a population of 13,706. == References == == Other websites == * 2002: Burnage * ManchesterOnline Spotlight On Burnage Site * British History Online: Burnage * Burnage High School * The Barlow School * 2001 Census results for Burnage Category:Districts of Manchester
title: Burnage
